verses.content: Aigupta rama inthawka Israel thlahai an fe suok chena inthawka thla thumna, chu ni chun Sinai thlalêr chu an hung tlung tah a.
Rephidim an mâksan a, Sinai thlalêr an hung tlung chun thlalêra chun puon in an zar a; chutaka chun Israelhai chun tlâng hmaa chun bûk an khuor a.
Mosie chu Pathien kuomah a hang feh a, chun, tlânga inthawkin LALPA chun ama a hung ko a, “Jakob sûnghai lai chun hieng hin hril la, Israel thlahai chu hril rawh;
Aigupta mihai chunga ka thil- thaw tah le, mupui thlahai chunga phur cheua ka kuoma ngei ka ṭhuoizie cheu kha in hmu tah a.
Chuleiin, tuhin, ka thu in awi tak tak a, ka thuthlung in kawl tak tak ding chun, hnuoi hi ka ta a ni sih a, hnam dang po po lai chun ka ta dingin ro bîk nîng in tih.
Chun, ka ta dingin thiempuhai ram le hnam inthieng ni bawk in tih. Hieng thuhai hi a nih Israel thlahai kuoma i hril ding chu,” a tih a.
Chun, Mosie chu a hung a, Israel upahai chu ân kotir a, hieng thuhai po po LALPAIN a kuoma thu a pêkhai chu an hmaah a târlang tah a.
Chun, mipui po po chun a ruolin an dawn a, “LALPAIN a hril po pohai chu thâwng kan tih,” an tih a. Mosie chun mipui thuhai chu LALPA kuoma chun ân tlun tah a.

LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “Ngai ta, i kuoma thu ka hril lai an hriet theina ding le, kumkhuoha an ring zing theina ding chein, sûm sâmup lai i kuomah hung ka tih,” a tih a. Mosie chun mipui thuhai chu LALPA chu a hril a.
LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “Mipui kuoma chun fe la, vawisûn le zîngah sukthieng rawh, an silfênhai chu sâwp hai sienla;
ni thum ni chun inzo hieuin um raw hai se, chu ni thum ni chun Sinai tlâng chungah mipui po po mithmuah LALPA chu a hung ṭum ding a ni sih a.
Chun, a vêlin ramrihai khang- pêk i ta, Tlâng hang kai lo dingin le a sîr vêl tâwk lo dingin invêng ṭha ro; tukhawm tlâng tâwk taphawt chu sukhlum nîng a tih;

ama chu kut hrimin tâwk naw nih a, dêng hlum, annawleh, kâp hlum nîng a tih; sa khawm ni sien, mihriem khawm ni sien hring naw hrim hrim a tih: tawtawrâwt sâwttak ân ri pha, tlânga chun hung lâwn an tih,” a tih a.
Mosie chu tlânga inthawk chun mipui kuomah a fe thlah a, mipui chu a sukthieng a, an silfênhai chu an sâwp tah a.
Chun, mipui kuoma chun, “Ni thum nia chun inzosa hieuin um unla, nuhmei khawm pâwl dêr naw ro,” a tih a.
Ni thum ni chun zîngkâr a la ni laiin, vâninrûmhai, ṭêktlahai, tlâng chunga sûm sâmup le, tawtawrâwt ri inringtak el chu a um tah a; bûka mipui um po po chu an inthin tah a.
Mosie chun mipui chu Pathien tuok dingin bûka inthawk chun a hung ṭhuoi suok a, tlâng ṭhuta chun an ngîr tah a.
LALPA chu meichawka a hung ṭum leiin, Sinai tlâng po po chu a khu ta vawng el a; chu khu chu rawtuina meikhu angin ân tung ta lui el a: tlâng chu nasatakin ân hnîng bawk a.
Tawtawrâwt ri chu a hung inring deu deu chun Mosie chun a hang biek a, Pathien râwlriin a hung dawn tah a.
LALPA chu Sinai tlâng chung- ah, tlâng sîpa chun a hung ṭum a: chun, Mosie chu tlânga chun a zuk ko a, Mosie chu a hang fe tah a.
LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “Fe thla la, mipui chu khap rawh, chuong naw chun hung en dingin LALPA kuom hung nêr thleng hlau an ta, mi tamtak bohmang rawi an tih.
Chun, thiempuhai LALPA hnaia hunghai khawm chu insukthieng raw hai se; chuong naw chun an chungah LALPA lungninaw rawi a tih,” a tih a.
Mosie chun LALPA kuomah, “Mipui chu Sinai tlâng hung kai thei naw ni hai, nangin, ‘Tlâng vêla chun ramrihai khang unla, sukthieng ro’, tiha i mi phût tlat leiin,” a tih a.

LALPA chun a kuomah, “Fe rawh, nang zu fe thla la, Aron ṭhuoiin hung i ta, nisienlakhawm, thiempu- hai le mipui chu LALPA kuoma hung dingin hung innêr thlengtir naw rawh, chuong naw chun an chungah LALPA lungninaw rawi a tih,” a tih a.
Chuongchun, Mosie chu mipui kuoma chun a fe thlah a, anni a hril tah a.
